# boto3-session-helper-287278

AWS configuration utilities for Python applications.

## Installation

```bash
pip install boto3-session-helper-287278
```

## Usage

```python
from boto3_session_helper_287278 import get_config, get_client

# Get AWS configuration
config = get_config()

# Get S3 client
s3 = get_client('s3')
```
